txtz.title: MEDALS OVER MORALS
txtz.desc: THE RUSSIAN GOVERNMENT'S "MEDALS-OVER-MORALS DISGUSTS ME," SAYS HEAD OF IPC, WHICH ORGANISES THE EVENT FOR ATHLETES WITH PHYSICAL IMPAIRMENTS; IT FOLLOWS THE OLYMPICS IN SEPTEMBER

txtz.title: BLANKET BAN ON RUSSIAN ATHLETES DENIED
txtz.desc: TOPIC OLYMPIC OFFICIALS DECIDED AGAINST A BLANKET BAN ON RUSSIAN ATHLETES, LEAVING THE DECISION UP TO INDIVIDUAL SPORTS FEDERATIONS

txtz.title: A THIRD OF RUSSIA'S BARRED FROM RIO
txtz.desc: 100+ RUSSIAN OLYMPIANS -- ABOUT A THIRD OF THE COUNTRY'S DELEGATION -- WERE BARRED FROM COMPETING IN RIO
